hero.sectionBadge: The Gold Standard of Digital Identity
hero.title: The Only Link Your Business Needs.

features.title: Powerful Features. One Smart Platform.
features.description: Everything you need to build a stunning digital presence, connect with your audience, and manage your business — all from one simple, elegant platform.

themes.title: Artistic Themes
themes.description: Bespoke, professional themes designed to elevate your brand's digital presence instantly.

contact.title: Multi-Channel Contact
contact.description: Consolidate all your communication lines—WhatsApp, Telegram, and Phone—into a single hub.

dynamicData.title: Dynamic Modules
dynamicData.description: Add galleries, services, and partner logos with our flexible, easy-to-manage modular system.

interactiveLocations.title: Interactive Locations
interactiveLocations.description: CDirect your clients with precision using our integrated, one-tap Google Maps modules.

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-language Support
multiLanguageSupport.description: Seamlessly switch between English and Arabic with native RTL support for international growth.

247PrioritySupport.title: 24/7 Priority Support
247PrioritySupport.description: Get instant help when you need it most. Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to ensure your restaurant never misses a beat.

testimonials.title: Client Success Stories
testimonials.description: See what our satisfied clients have to say about our portfolio and digital presence solutions.

first.name: Alex Turner
first.content: The portfolio website transformed our online presence. Our booking inquiries increased by 200% in just 3 months.

second.name: Maya Patel
second.content: The linktree-style page made it so easy for clients to find all our social media and contact information in one place.

third.name: David Chen
third.content: The business portfolio helped us secure major partnerships. The design perfectly represents our brand identity.

fourth.name: Sophia Williams
fourth.content: Our click-through rates on social links improved by 150% after implementing the optimized portfolio page.

fifth.name: Ryan Brooks
fifth.content: The portfolio showcase helped me land premium clients. The gallery presentation is absolutely stunning!

sixth.name: Lena Schmidt
sixth.content: Having all our contact, booking, and social links in one beautiful page made client interaction seamless.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: One comprehensive plan with all features included. Choose your billing cycle and get started today.
